name: Encrust
description:
A college project. Currently a rough prototype. May be reworked, optimised, and expanded in future.

Encrust is a survival game where you must avoid the harsh sunlight and find a way down to the safety of underground.

Controls:

  • WASD & SPACE for Movement
  • E to toggle crafting menu
  • Scroll OR 1-9 to select hotbar
  • Right Click to use item
